# CSCNet

Flexible tools for fitting, tuning and obtaining absolute risk
predictions from regularized cause-specific cox (CSC) models with
elastic-net penalty.

## Installation

You can install the latest version of CSCNet from
[CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/) and [GitHub](https://github.com):

``` r
#CRAN

install.packages('CSCNet')

#GitHub

install.packages('devtools') #If you haven't installed it yet!

devtools::install_github('Shahin-Roshani/CSCNet')
```

## Links

[CRAN page](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=CSCNet)

[Deployed GitHub page](https://shahin-roshani.github.io/CSCNet/)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`penCSC()`](https://shahin-roshani.github.io/CSCNet/reference/penCSC.md)
  : penCSC
- [`predict(`*`<penCSC>`*`)`](https://shahin-roshani.github.io/CSCNet/reference/predict.penCSC.md)
  : predict.penCSC
- [`predictRisk(`*`<penCSC>`*`)`](https://shahin-roshani.github.io/CSCNet/reference/predictRisk.penCSC.md)
  : predictRisk.penCSC
- [`print(`*`<penCSC>`*`)`](https://shahin-roshani.github.io/CSCNet/reference/print.penCSC.md)
  : print.penCSC
- [`print(`*`<tune_penCSC>`*`)`](https://shahin-roshani.github.io/CSCNet/reference/print.tune_penCSC.md)
  : print.tune_penCSC
- [`tune_penCSC()`](https://shahin-roshani.github.io/CSCNet/reference/tune_penCSC.md)
  : tune_penCSC
